original_text: Now the eyes of Israel were dim with age, so that he could not see. So Joseph brought them near him, and he kissed them and embraced them.
korean_text: 이스라엘의 눈이 나이로 말미암아 어두워서 보지 못하더라 요셉이 두 아들을 이끌어 아버지 앞으로 나아가니 이스라엘이 그들에게 입맞추고 그들을 안고

sentences.original_text: Now the eyes of Israel were dim with age
so that he could not see
So Joseph brought them near him
